tool_description: Automatically generate scheduled and on-demand PDFs, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoints, and other reports on your data.
name: ConnectReport Core
title: ConnectReport Core

api_list.name: getJob
api_list.description: Get the status of a queued job, including its status and result if available.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://connectreport-core.p.rapidapi.com/jobs/65d397fc-b8b1-4e07-9437-026253db663a"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "connectreport-core.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://connectreport-core.p.rapidapi.com/jobs/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "connectreport-core.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getReportTask
api_list.description: Read a report task by its ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://connectreport-core.p.rapidapi.com/report-tasks/65d397fc-b8b1-4e07-9437-026253db663a"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "connectreport-core.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://connectreport-core.p.rapidapi.com/report-tasks/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "connectreport-core.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

startOn.description: Datetime in UTC when report task's schedule will start

endOn.description: Datetime in UTC when report task schedule will end

frequency.description: Describes the frequency of the report task's schedule

every.description: The interval of the report task's schedule

at.description: Datetime in UTC when the report task will execute

enabled.description: Denotes whether the report task will go into the report processing queue

filterSets.description: Array of objects denoting filter sets to apply to the report task

nextRunAt.description: Calculated datetime in UTC when the report task will run next, if applicable

error.description: The error object from the last report task execution, if applicable

averageTimeToGenerate.description: The average time to run the report task, in minutes

fieldName.description: The label of the field. Used for display in certain scenarios.

customSelection.description: Custom filters to apply. This field will be updated entirely if provided

dataPlatformWaitTime.description: The time spent waiting on data platform responses during the last report task execution, in minutes

email.description: Denotes whether the generated report should be emailed to its users or groups after a successful run

groupsToShareWith.description: Groups to share the published report with. This field will be updated entirely if provided

usersToShareWith.description: Users to share the published report with. This field will be updated entirely if provided

api_list.name: renderTemplate
api_list.description: Render a report template to PDF, PPTX, or XLSX. Responds with a job entity.

api_list.name: getReportTasks

optional_parameters.name: meta
optional_parameters.description: When you list report tasks you can filter the list given one or metadata key/value pairs. Only items that contain all of the given metadata properties are returned. You may also specify the `meta` property in the request body.
